channel.title: Autonomous Vehicles on Krishna Kumar T
channel.description: Recent content in Autonomous Vehicles on Krishna Kumar T

item.title: The unexplored subtleties on “Going autonomous”
item.description: On a winter morning before the first light I was going on my bike on a silent road in the early hours of the day. The road looks entirely abandoned as it was one of the most chilling days of winter and I was not expecting anyone coming on to the road. But I was very much ambivalent and kept an eye on both sides of the road as far I can see through the fog.
